wikipedia_page.main: James Hopkins (born 1873) was an English footballer. His regular position was as an inside right. He was born in Manchester. He played a single game for Newton Heath, the club that would later become Manchester United, against New Brighton Tower on 18 March 1899, having previously played for Berry's Association.

response: *James Hopkins (footballer, born 1873) (1873–?), English association football player for Manchester United
*James Hopkins (footballer, born 1901) (1901–1943), Northern Irish association football player for Arsenal and Brighton
James Hopkins (12 July 1901 – 1943) was a Northern Irish association football player who played at inside forward.
